page.title: 09Leisure & Entertainment
page.content: Much of the area is covered by urban recreational open space. The Jumbles Countryside Park is found in the northern part. Elsewhere there is a variety of parks and other amenities.Longsight Park is used by football and rounders teams and bowling greens are found there and at the Royal Oak Inn,Bradshaw. Private cricket clubs exist at Castle Hill and Bradshaw and tennis courts are also found at the latter. There are no sports centres,however, and residents have to travel out of the area to find these facilities. There are many public houses along the main roads.Walsh's Institute is used for many indoor leisure activities eg evening classes,dancing and luncheon clubs. There are three Scout or Guide huts in the area.
